publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-4694 Des McNulty: Humanitarian Aid to the Middle East—That the Parliament congratulates development agencies working in the Middle East for the work that they are doing to deliver humanitarian aid to all those affected by the current crisis; calls on the international community to take steps to improve access to humanitarian aid and to get assistance to internally displaced people and refugees who are victims of the current crisis; believes that to achieve this and prevent any further civilian casualties an immediate cessation in hostilities is needed, and supports UN Secretary-General Kofi Annan’s call for a durable ceasefire. Supported by: Campbell Martin*, Dr Elaine Murray*, Eleanor Scott*, Mr Charlie Gordon*, Roseanna Cunningham*, Brian Adam*, Chris Ballance*, Fiona Hyslop*, Sarah Boyack*, Mike Pringle*, Bill Butler*, Maureen Macmillan*, Mr Jim Wallace*, Pauline McNeill*, Nora Radcliffe*, Mr Mark Ruskell*, Dennis Canavan*, Marilyn Livingstone*, Robin Harper*, Mr John Swinney* Motions and amendments which have attracted additional support
S2M-4694 Humanitarian Aid to the Middle East (lodged on 7 August 2006) Richard Lochhead*, Karen Gillon*, Karen Whitefield*, Shiona Baird*, Ms Rosemary Byrne*, Donald Gorrie*, Frances Curran*
